notuptodatemessage: App version is not up-to-date, please update the app
message:
Thank you for your huge support!!!

I am really happy to read your comments and replies, and I am working on the suggestions many of you gave me. A new update with all these suggestions will be released soon :)

Thank you
- Niranjan
changelog:
Changelog:
-------------------------
* APK Splited as per CPU arch
* Optimization
* APK size reduced by 70%
* Chip Style Navigation Bar
* Added Tutorials
* External Download Manager
* Fixed Over Caching problem
* Added Terms of conditions and privacy policy
* Website major update
